column4: Can any one help me with this? > I attempt to log into my Win7 share, it constantly asks for username and password, even though I put them in right and set it too remember. It never even let's me mount the folder
DasEI: How exactly do I do that? Something like "sudo smbclient -L //192.168.1.5 -U bit "?
I think you shouldn't use sudo with smbclient.
Oops, didn't mean to add that in there. I don't.
